Quote.Author: Lee Unkrich
Quote.QuoteValue: How about a good comedy? 'Raising Arizona.' Remains the funniest movie I've ever seen in my life

Quote.Author: Lee Unkrich

Quote.Author: Lee Unkrich

Quote.Author: Lee Unkrich

Quote.Author: Leigh Steinberg

Quote.Author: Leigh Steinberg

Quote.QuoteValue: I ran track, and basically played every sport

Quote.Author: Leighton Meester
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so accustomed to being alone

Quote.Author: Leighton Meester

Quote.Author: Leighton Meester

Quote.Author: Leighton Meester

Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I start feeling sexy I trip

Quote.Author: Lena Dunham

Quote.Author: Lena Dunham
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I think about doing stuff that nobody else has done

Quote.Author: Lena Dunham
Quote.QuoteValue: I seriously consider television to be the people's medium

Quote.Author: Lena Headey
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe you just don't see your own beauty

Quote.Author: Lena Headey
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, horror movies are a real escape

Quote.Author: Lena Headey
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I cry when I'm angry. I let it go that way

Quote.Author: Lena Headey

Quote.Author: Lena Headey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm dreadful at schmoozing at Hollywood parties

Quote.Author: Lena Headey
Quote.QuoteValue: I could quite happily run a florist or a bake shop

Quote.Author: Lenny Abrahamson

Quote.Author: Lenny Bruce

Quote.Author: Leo Burnett

Quote.Author: Leo Burnett

Quote.Author: Leo Burnett

Quote.Author: Leon Trotsky

Quote.Author: Leon Trotsky

Quote.Author: Leon Trotsky

Quote.Author: Leon Trotsky

Quote.Author: Leona Lewis

Quote.Author: Leona Lewis

Quote.Author: Leonard Cohen
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the surer I am that I'm not running the show

Quote.Author: Leonard Cohen
Quote.QuoteValue: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress

Quote.Author: Leonard Cohen

Quote.Author: Leonard Cohen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you stop thinking about yourself all the time, a certain sense of repose overtakes you

Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual

Quote.QuoteValue: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people

Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is a walking miracle

Quote.QuoteValue: Drugs? Every one has a choice and I choose not to do drugs

Quote.Author: Leonardo DiCaprio

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: The way prices are rising, the good old days are last week

Quote.QuoteValue: My mother-in-law fell down a wishing well. I was amazed; I never knew they worked

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife is a sex object - every time I ask for sex, she objects

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can always tell when the mother in law's coming to stay; the mice throw themselves on the traps

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is an institution and that's where a couple finish up

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've just had some bad news. Tomorrow is the mother in law's funeral. And she's cancelled it

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother-in-law has so many wrinkles, when she smiles she looks like a Venetian blind

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: The wife's run off with the bloke next door. I do miss him

Quote.Author: Les Dawson
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother-in-law's so fat that when she passes her handbag from hand to hand she throws it

Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have a scene with Maggie Smith

Quote.Author: Lesley Nicol

Quote.Author: Lesley Nicol

Quote.Author: Lesley Nicol

Quote.Author: Levon Helm

Quote.Author: Levon Helm
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm a millionaire, but I'm comfortable

Quote.Author: Lewis B. Smedes

Quote.Author: Lewis Mumford

Quote.Author: Lewis Mumford

Quote.Author: Lewis Mumford

Quote.Author: Li Keqiang

Quote.QuoteValue: I would prefer to have no money but to have a nice family and good friends around
